results.title: Simvastatin Treatment in Traumatic Brain Injury: Operation Brain Trauma Therapy.
results.text_hl: Results indicated an intermediate beneficial effect of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ on motor performance on the gridwalk (FPI), balance beam (@DISEASE_Epilepsy_Post_Traumatic @DISEASE_MESH:D004834 @@@CCI@@@), and rotarod tasks (@<m>DISEASE_Head_Injuries_Penetrating</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D020197 @@@PBBI@@@).

citations.NLM: Mountney A, Bramlett HM, Dixon CE, Mondello S, Dietrich WD, Wang KK, Caudle K, Empey PE, Poloyac SM, Hayes RL, Povlishock JT, Tortella FC, Kochanek PM, Shear DA. Simvastatin Treatment in Traumatic Brain Injury: Operation Brain Trauma Therapy. J Neurotrauma. 2016 Mar 15;33(6):567-80. PMID: 26541177
citations.BibTeX: @article{26541177, title={Simvastatin Treatment in Traumatic Brain Injury: Operation Brain Trauma Therapy.}, author={Mountney A and Bramlett HM and Dixon CE and Mondello S and Dietrich WD and Wang KK and Caudle K and Empey PE and Poloyac SM and Hayes RL and Povlishock JT and Tortella FC and Kochanek PM and Shear DA}, journal={J Neurotrauma}, volume={33}, number={6}, pages={567-80}}

results.title: Intravenous Administration of Simvastatin Improves Cognitive Outcome following Severe Traumatic Brain Injury in Rats.
results.text_hl: All @<m>DISEASE_Head_Injuries_Penetrating</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D020197 @@@PBBI@@@-injured animals showed @DISEASE_Cognition_Disorders @DISEASE_MESH:D003072 @@@cognitive impairment@@@ on the MWM test; however, 10-day @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ treatment mitigated these effects.

citations.NLM: Mountney A, Boutté AM, Gilsdorf J, Lu XC, Tortella FC, Shear DA. Intravenous Administration of Simvastatin Improves Cognitive Outcome following Severe Traumatic Brain Injury in Rats. J Neurotrauma. 2016 Aug 15;33(16):1492-500. PMID: 26542887
citations.BibTeX: @article{26542887, title={Intravenous Administration of Simvastatin Improves Cognitive Outcome following Severe Traumatic Brain Injury in Rats.}, author={Mountney A and Boutté AM and Gilsdorf J and Lu XC and Tortella FC and Shear DA}, journal={J Neurotrauma}, volume={33}, number={16}, pages={1492-500}}
